TopicTitle: How can I see what experiments I've already done and in which biome ?

Articles.Content:
Is there any in-game way how to tell which experiments and where I've already done, without sending another craft and getting 0 points each time I forget that I was already there ?

.

I can still look it up in the persistent file, but this is a rather cumbersome way...

Edited October 22, 2013 by MBobrik

No, I dont think you can !

I wish if there was actually a way to

Would be nice to have access to a permanent copy of all the data logs/reports generated in game, which would provide that same information plus give you a sense if there's any more science to extract from places already visited.

=Smidge=

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/rdoverview3/

Adds a UI for completed science experiments, giving you the amount earned and remaining. It also allows sorting and filtering. It will only show experiments you have earned points for.

There is a mod that does this but im at work so dont have the link to hand

EDIT: I managed to post that just as aven posted a link to it
